meanings.definition: The quality or state of being bleary.
meanings.sent1: Her bleariness made it difficult for her to focus on the words in the book.
meanings.sent2: The bleariness in his eyes indicated that he had not slept well the night before.
meanings.sent3: Despite the bleariness in her vision, she managed to find her way through the foggy forest.
meanings.sent4: The bleariness of the old photograph added a nostalgic touch to the family album.
meanings.sent5: The bleariness of the early morning mist enveloped the entire valley in a dreamy haze.

meanings.definition: The condition of being dim or blurred, especially due to tiredness or illness.
meanings.sent1: The bleariness of the streetlights made it hard to see the road clearly.
meanings.sent2: His bleariness was a clear sign that he needed to rest and recover from the flu.
meanings.sent3: The bleariness of the movie screen gave the film a mysterious and eerie atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: The bleariness of her memory after the accident made it difficult to recall the details.
meanings.sent5: The bleariness of the distant mountains in the fog created a beautiful and ethereal scene.
